enum: Proportion of population covered by at least one social protection benefit
Proportion of children/households receiving child/family cash benefit
Proportion of population with severe disabilities receiving disability cash benefit
Proportion of mothers with newborns receiving maternity cash benefit
Proportion of population above statutory pensionable age receiving a pension
Proportion of poor population receiving social assistance cash benefit
Proportion of unemployed persons receiving unemployment cash benefit
Proportion of vulnerable population receiving social assistance cash benefit
Proportion of employed population covered in the event of work injury

title: Proportion of population covered by social protection floors/systems, by sex, distinguishing children, unemployed persons, older persons, persons with disabilities, pregnant women, newborns, work-injury victims and the poor and the vulnerable
